```{r load_packages, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, include=FALSE} 
library(dplyr)
library(fontawesome)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
```

```{r eval = TRUE, echo = FALSE}
unchecked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("circle", fill = "#e4e4e4", height = "15px"))

checked <- as.character(fontawesome::fa("check-circle", fill = "#428bca", height = "15px"))

wk_post <- tibble(
  

"Data Camp" = c(unchecked,
                unchecked,
                checked),

"eCampus" = c(unchecked,
              checked,
              unchecked),

"R" = c(unchecked,
        checked,
        checked),

"Slack" = c(unchecked,
            checked,
            unchecked),

Description = c("Review a Shiny presentation",
                "Submit your Shiny Project",
                "Complete two modules"),

Location = c("[Link](/lesson/11-lesson/#data-collection)",
             "[Link](/projects/02-project/#step-ii-visualization)",
             "[Link](/lesson/11-lesson/#data-camp){target='_blank'}")

)
```
